about_the_game:
We are happy to introduce another great photography by King Wong, that captures the Byodoin temple in a magnificent way. The almost perfect reflection of it in the lake makes this a very interesting composition and the perfect challenge for our puzzle masters.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 2000, and 2500 puzzle tiles. This is going to be a very unique challenge first because of the reflection and second because of the intricate architecture of the temple itself. We hope you'll have many fun hours trying to assemble it.
detailed_description:
We are happy to introduce another great photography by King Wong, that captures the Byodoin temple in a magnificent way. The almost perfect reflection of it in the lake makes this a very interesting composition and the perfect challenge for our puzzle masters.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 2000, and 2500 puzzle tiles. This is going to be a very unique challenge first because of the reflection and second because of the intricate architecture of the temple itself. We hope you'll have many fun hours trying to assemble it.

  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 720p Capable Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
